summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specified period in 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and fees associated with the account, as well as instructions for addressing errors in transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Gregory Riches
persons.context: Gregory Riches is referenced in connection with outgoing money transfers from the account.

connections.description: Gregory Riches is the account holder who may seek assistance from Amanda Kirby, the customer service representative.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for the period from March 1, 2015, to March 31, 2015.
The account had a beginning balance of $10,334.11 and an ending balance of $32,332.46.
Multiple transactions include preauthorized debits for taxes and fees, as well as outgoing transfers to Gregory Riches.
There are instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified timeframes.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of a larger set of financial records.
